basics.name: Luca Castellone
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Hello I'm Luca - an appassionate Web Developer, who loves to work with challenging and creative projects.  I have four years relevant working experience, during which I have managed many different projects and built skills in several areas.  My focus is in developing scalable and maintainable application architectures by invoking industry best practices, design patterns, and creativity.  Part of my creativity is my eagerness to learn. I'm constantly improving my solutions and I like to keep up, or even stay ahead, as well!

work.summary: Menthalia is a full-service communications agency, primarily serving healthcare & pharmaceutical clients. I am the sole “tech-guy” of company, so have direct responsibility on all IT activities and communicate directly with stakeholders to assess project requirements, and convert needs into intuitive and scalable architecture solutions. My main duty is building web application(in particular CMS websites), covering everything from front-end and back-end development, dev-ops, migration, design, support, analytics – you name it, I’ve had my hand in  it at some point. My team is formed by a layout artist (who creates the basic graphic idea) and a copywriter.
